statement: A. Average Numberstime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutYou are given a sequence of positive integersa1,a2, ...,an. You are given a sequence of positive integers $a_1, a_2, ..., a_n$.  Find all indices $i$ such that the $i$-th element equals the average of all the other elements.

Output the number of such indices, followed by the indices in increasing order. If no such indices exist, output 0.

You are given a list of numbers. Find all the numbers in the list that are equal to the average of the rest of the numbers in the list.  If no such numbers exist, print 0. Otherwise, print the count of such numbers followed by the list of those numbers.
